content: Honeywell International Inc  has made its largest purchase in more than a decade  agreeing to buy the utility consumption metering business of Britain's Melrose Industries Plc  for about $5.1 billion.

title: Honeywell to buy Melrose's utility metering business for $5.1 billion

content: July 28 Honeywell International Inc has made its largest purchase in more than a decade  agreeing to buy the utility consumption metering business of Britain's Melrose Industries Plc for about $5.1 billion.
